attributes.action: Knock down The Station Hotel, Ayr
attributes.additional_details: This should happen because South Ayrshire council have already wasted millions of pounds on Trying to make it safe with scaffolding, and since the fire the roads around it have come to a stand still.
attributes.background: Knock down The Station Hotel, Ayr and build a new bus and train station for Ayr.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the demolition of this building are a matter for the owners and the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise this case with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
